entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Meter/Counters to track hits for each route/endpoint #46361
  • Row expand on rows in Blazor QuickGrid #46356
  • Blazor initializer scripts are cached when they clearly have been changed- #46355
  • Render a webassembly component into the page #46354
    8.0-preview2
  • Render a server component into the page #46353
    8.0-preview2
  • We can render updates while we SSR an app #46352
    8.0-preview2
  • We can perform basic CRUD operations on a completely SSR Razor Components app #46351
    8.0-preview2
  • We can render a page statically SSR using Razor components. #46350
    8.0-preview2
  • Support generating parameter validations via source generation #46349
    .NET 8 Planning
  • route with product/detail/{id?}-{persionKey?}-{sex?}-{price?} not work #46359
  • ConfigurationBuilder not support record type #46345
  • Is there a way I can compile small piece of C# code to wasm #46344
    Discussions
  • Share route pattern parsing logic between analyzers and generators #46342
    .NET 8 Planning
  • DeveloperExceptionMiddleware shouldn't have dependencies to `ProblemDetails` #46339

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 5, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-107944-.NET5 #36357
  • 'The process cannot access the file' during CI build sometimes #32219
  • Simplify single file directories in shared sources #19080
    Backlog
  • Reduce PR / official build differences #32910
  • [Blazor] InputText component renders invalid html #46183
    8.0-preview2
  • Using angular template project. Running "ng serve" independently fails when trying to proxy request to dotnet. #45364
    8.0-preview1
  • Update template metadata for net8 #45077
    8.0-preview1
  • Unobserved task exception in SignalR C# client when streaming #46169
    8.0-preview2
  • HTTP Error 500.31 is rather unhelpful #46021
    8.0-preview2
  • dotnet6 application not working in windows server 2016 #46348
  • Enable ALPN tests/features on MAC #45569
    8.0-preview1
  • RegexRouteConstraint should use Compiled Regex #46154
    8.0-preview2
  • [AOT] Improve suppressions on RouteEndpointDataSource #45863
    8.0-preview2
  • [Trimming] Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results #41015
    8.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Update references to System.IO.Pipelines #46360

Merged

  • [Named pipes] Disconnect + delayed client read test cases #46166
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixed rendering of self closing elements #46347
    8.0-preview2
  • Update bot configuration for new Preview2 milestone #46341
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Update WebApplication XML comment punctuation. #46314
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Rebrand for release #46340
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Avoid UnobservedTaskExceptions when getting an error in server to client streaming #46198
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview2
  • Improve IIS error when wrong application path #46249
    servers-iis, area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Install VS Community by default #46262
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Improve DFA matcher builder startup perf with many constraints #46323
    Perf, area-mvc, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview2
  • Rebrand for 8.0.0-preview2 #46282
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Change ErrorViewModel class to record #46319
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-web-frameworks
  • Changing reflection-base json configuration to PostConfigure #46303
  • Source-build should also use the release runtime. #46299
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0.x
  • Add support for response writing to RequestDelegateGenerator #46291
    area-web-frameworks
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update SauceLabs Connection version #45242
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • [Draft] Do a test run on new Debian12 image #46273
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
